summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 CHUNFENG HOLDING GROUP TORINO SCOOTER (NA).  WHENEVER THE CONTACT DOES NOT USE THE SCOOTER FOR 24 HOURS, THE BATTERY BECOMES COMPLETELY DRAINED.  WHILE DRIVING AT ANY SPEED, THE VEHICLE STOPS ACCELERATING AND IMMEDIATELY SHUTS OFF.  THE FAILURE OCCURS EVERYTIME THE VEHICLE IS DRIVEN AND EVER SINCE IT WAS PURCHASED.  THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN DIAGNOSED BY THE DEALER.  THE VIN WAS UNKNOWN.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 500 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 9.
